column1: Check out my latest newsletter for information on my office’s upcoming events including my next Town Hall on Saturday January 25 from 12-1pm at @MTLSD High School Auditorium. #PA17 https://t.co/m11KD8eubz

REMINDER: If you have an issue related to a federal agency my office can help. In addition to visiting or calling one of my District Offices we host mobile office hours each month & will be at Penn Hills Library on Wednesday 1/15 from 10a-3p. #PA17 https://t.co/JFYbdw00VD https://t.co/KcfQTU9xZA

Join me for my next Town Hall on Saturday January 25 at 12pm in the Auditorium at @MTLSD High School. Enter through doors A-2 located off of Cochran Road. #PA17 https://t.co/xHNSlpXCd6 https://t.co/spHP3X8lNJ

Today top national security officials briefed members of Congress on the killing of Qasem Soleimani & rising tensions with Iran. The administration owes us an explanation of why things in the Middle East are getting worse. Read my full statement below: https://t.co/n2d9pAPKxV
Congratulations to the #PA17 winners of the 2019 @CongressionalAC from @shady_side. I look forward to seeing your app “Mathias” displayed in the U.S. Capitol this year. https://t.co/QfzctZ0nYA
Happy New Year! We have made progress this year but there is much more to be done. Read my 2019 report to see how I am working for #PA17. https://t.co/LHmOOWS5yW
May this holiday season fill you with light and peace. Merry Christmas and Happy Hanukkah. #PA17

My team is hosting mobile office hours today in Aliquippa (Thursday 12/19) & tomorrow in the North Hills (Friday 12/20). All times are 10a-3p. Stop by if you need assistance with an issue related to a federal agency. #PA17 https://t.co/YtRlCMuxvU
https://t.co/p7FaMbMo5J

The electric grid powers the lives of all Americans. H.R. 5429 is commonsense legislation I introduced to support the research programs to adopt new technologies improve the environment & create family-sustaining jobs in the energy economy. #PA17 https://t.co/5iYDl1pzHN

Thanks to Ms. Nassan & the students at @Seneca_Valley Senior High for inviting me to visit today. Hopefully over the holiday break you’ll take some time to catch up on those classic ‘90’s movies we discussed. #PA17 https://t.co/1zE9sOY5Cl

No one should have to choose between taking lifesaving medicine & paying for food. H.R. 3 will help seniors & families in #PA17 who face that choice because of the high cost of their prescriptions. https://t.co/Uty4JWSA8h

Congratulations to @NorthHillsMS teacher @nhsdwelch who was named Teacher of the Year by @PADeptofEd. It was great to meet you & your students at my recent Student Digital Town Hall.  Thanks for your work in the classroom every day. #PA17

Thanks to @StBarnabasHS and @ALZIMPACT for giving me the opportunity to hear firsthand from residents and caregivers about the impact of Alzheimer’s and dementia on our community. #PA17 https://t.co/5OJn9ppq3P
Thankful for the service men and women who welcomed a bipartisan delegation to share their holiday with them overseas. #PA17 https://t.co/q2Plvy8GeS

Celebrating #Thanksgiving with American troops overseas. There are a lot of men and women separated from their families and friends today because they chose to serve our country. Please keep them in mind as you sit down with your loved ones today. #PA17 https://t.co/3J4XQYuvcc
Thanks to the administration and student council of @deerlakessd for hosting a great town hall discussion today. #PA17 #DLProud https://t.co/KHrE52Yojq

This week I participated in a run with @GWOTMF to support building the #GWOTMemorial & joined a bipartisan group of colleagues to clean & preserve the Korean War Veterans Memorial. #PA17 https://t.co/0Wh9WuOUA0

This morning @VetAffairsDems held a critical hearing on legislation to address the veteran suicide crisis & hear directly from @DeptVetAffairs @SecWilkie.  Congress must do all that we can to ensure that veterans have the support & care they need. #PA17 https://t.co/sE06THWuRR

My team is hosting mobile office hours this week in Penn Hills (Wednesday 11/20) Aliquippa (Thursday 11/21) & the North Hills (Friday 11/22). All times are 10a-3p. Stop by if you need assistance with an issue related to a federal agency. #PA17 https://t.co/41Bczsc854
@north_hills @NorthHillsMS Thanks so much for hosting me today!
Thanks to all of the students who participated & asked great questions at my Student Digital Town Hall today. Special thanks to @north_hills & @NorthHillsMS for hosting. #PA17 https://t.co/g3ZXD7e0z5

Look forward to working to improve the roads bridges locks & dams pipelines airports & railways in #PA17. Infrastructure investments will help fill many good jobs & continue to grow our regional economy. https://t.co/8p53sux5l1
Thanks to @jesmtlsd and @jmsmtlsd in @MTLSD for inviting me to kick off Veterans Day with the students as they honored our local veterans with a breakfast. #PA17 https://t.co/FdM8nOIvEu
Thank you Veterans for your service and sacrifice. https://t.co/5y8Lpxbskd https://t.co/uSNYp2bUQf

Had a great day kicking off #VeteransDay weekend with #PA17 veterans to thank them for their dedication to this country. Thanks to @CCBCedu @Senatorcosta & Moon Township Parks & Rec for hosting these events to honor the lives & service of our veterans. https://t.co/Xa0vnrETuD
@north_hills Looking forward to it!

The @USDOT awarded @PITairport an $18.69M federal grant illustrating the confidence at the highest levels that Pittsburgh is a great place to do business. This grant means more jobs & investment in our region. #PA17 https://t.co/kmjYXEqThU

Students in grades 7-12 in #PA17 schools are invited to participate in my next Student Digital Town Hall hosted by @north_hills on 11/18 from 9a-10a.  Teachers & educators can submit questions from students when they RSVP to receive the secure event link: https://t.co/hOOxz7mTNT

My latest newsletter has information about recent legislation that passed the House that’s important for #PA17 as well as dates & times for upcoming events. Click here to read the newsletter & get information on how to sign up for news from my office: https://t.co/gj4xQ1HXkH

REMINDER: Applications are due by 5pm tomorrow (Thursday 10/31) for #PA17 high school students who seek a nomination to one of the U.S. Service Academies. Click here for more information about the application process: https://t.co/A8AJSkmBik

Calling all #PA17 coders—only a few days left to submit an app for the @CongressionalAC! Middle & high school students in our district are welcome to apply regardless of skill level. Visit my website for more information on how to register: https://t.co/W0bAXQYIXB https://t.co/WYDQmXEdEC
Today and always we stand united as a community against hate as we remember and repair together. #StrongerThanHate https://t.co/YDDsRnpNg5

Spent time this morning with local WWII veteran George Freas to record the story of his service for the @librarycongress #VeteransHistoryProject.  It’s important to preserve these stories & I’m excited to share his. #PA17 https://t.co/oOXFDkNnJ3

Thanks to Brother David & the @centralvikings students for a great discussion today at the @librarycongress during their DC visit. Looking forward to seeing many of you at Friday’s game against @mtlebofootball. #PA17 https://t.co/9Rk13x5qdf

My office is here to help #PA17 constituents with issues relating to federal agencies such as @DeptVetAffairs & @IRSnews. If you want to meet with a member of my team we are hosting mobile office hours at @northlandlib tomorrow (10/25) from 10a-3p. https://t.co/qH64kde0cO

Today the House passed the broad election protection package SHIELD Act which included my bill the DEFEND Act. Foreign governments want to lie to the American people. Let’s keep them out of our elections and debate these things ourselves. #PA17 https://t.co/4zm7LdHgLn

We must honor the commitments we made to those who worked in our nation’s coal mines. Today I joined @unionveterans @VVAmerica & retired miners to say it’s time to pass the Miners Pension Protection Act. #PA17 https://t.co/CLvZ1ddkki

My team provides mobile office hours to help #PA17 constituents with issues related to federal agencies. Tomorrow (10/23) my office will be at Penn Hills Library from 10a-3p. Sign up for my newsletter to get updates on all upcoming mobile office hours: https://t.co/wVPlhipgHz

Thanks to the staff and residents of Pendale Towers in Mt. Lebanon for inviting me to stop by for a great discussion. I look forward to seeing you around the neighborhood. #PA17 https://t.co/BPVMunZKXb
Well said. Rest in peace Congressman Cummings. https://t.co/KqfFarYJ3Y

Staff Sgt. Dylan Elchin served our country honorably. He was a hero to his fellow airmen & to all of us. @BeaverCtyPA citizens will forever remember Dylan’s sacrifice & service as we honor him with the dedication of the U.S. Post Office in Hookstown. #PA17 https://t.co/jtXWUwDElM

Today the House passed H.R. 2385 my bill with @RepBrianFitz to make it easier for universities to honor the lives & sacrifices of our service members through @DeptVetAffairs @VANatCemeteries Veterans Legacy Program. #PA17 https://t.co/mk9pbzucgh

We need to help support the recovery effort of coal communities and the robust funding afforded by @ARCgov $1.2 million ARC POWER grant will help promote small businesses & job creation in #PA17. https://t.co/Sy6ZxF4K30

ATTENTION middle & high school students living in or attending schools in #PA17: my office is accepting submissions for the Congressional App Challenge through November 1. This nationwide competition is for students interested in programming & app design. https://t.co/W0bAXQYIXB https://t.co/6lLrkj5puI
Happy Rosh Hashanah! Wishing you a new year full of peace happiness and good health.  L'shanah Tovah

Congress must continue our work to get the truth. I fully support the House Intelligence Committee’s inquiry and I believe that at each step of the way we must follow the evidence where it leads. https://t.co/tefBBb5cPs https://t.co/DHfuG2AZTm
There’s nothing partisan about following the law and protecting our national security. Congress must continue our work to get the truth. https://t.co/2f91JTlGCt https://t.co/oAlv5q42TJ

As I said yesterday we need to get the full text of the whistleblower complaint by Thursday not just the transcript of one phone call.   It appears that we will learn more facts in the coming days and I’ll have more to say after that.

My staff will be at @BFJonesLibrary in Aliquippa for mobile office hours on Thursday 9/26 from 10a-3p & can help #PA17 constituents with issues related to federal agencies such as @DeptVetAffairs or @SocialSecurity.. https://t.co/XdwlXvQ60b

We cannot allow even the possibility to exist that our President used the immense power of that office to protect his own selfish interests rather than to protect the American people. #PA17 https://t.co/1mFXC22SId https://t.co/awHGlDESsi

Do you need help with an issue related to a federal agency such as @IRSNews or @SocialSecurity? My team is hosting mobile office hours at Penn Hills Library tomorrow from 10a-3p to provide assistance. #PA17  https://t.co/w1CIxjNnxa

Today @HouseScience subcommittee advanced two important bipartisan energy bills including H.R. 4091 to reauthorize @ARPAE to invest in critical energy innovation research. https://t.co/TfG6I4MmeN #PA17

Today we commemorate the 18th anniversary of 9/11 and remember those we lost in Shanksville New York & the Pentagon & we honor our first responders for their courage & sacrifice on that day. https://t.co/VVN1Uc4E50

On Friday 9/13 from 10a-3p a member of my staff will be at @northlandlib in the North Hills for mobile office hours. Since January my team has helped save #PA17 constituents more than $665K & we are here to help with issues related to a federal agency.  https://t.co/Ar6BfpozYK
Thanks to @eatoncorp & @ScaloSolar for showing me some of the innovative energy solutions they are developing right here in #PA17. https://t.co/dUAxpk3noP

Thanks to @comcast & @VLPWPA for working to provide veterans with the essential tools & resources to access the benefits they’ve earned by expanding #InternetEssentials & ensuring basic internet connectivity. #PA17 https://t.co/ktTsCblM5C

Today I joined community leaders & veteran service organizations from the region to discuss how to better collaborate to help prevent & ultimately end veteran suicide. If you or a veteran you know is in crisis call the Veterans Crisis Line 1 (800) 273-8255.  #PA17 #BeThere https://t.co/zyHgp76aL3
Today we honor the labor movement that brought us all better working conditions & continues to build a stronger America. #LaborDay2019 #PA17 https://t.co/LcZssy5oaN
Toured the campus @Animal_Friends to glimpse the amazing work by the staff leadership & volunteers that help save the lives of our furry friends in #PA17. https://t.co/Yciq1qvHhb

REMINDERS: My staff will be in Aliquippa at @BFJonesLibrary today for mobile office hours from 10a-3p: https://t.co/H6stJ8xqkh.  Also join me tonight at 7p at @greentreeboro Administrative Office for my next Town Hall: https://t.co/P94ohF94hh #PA17

Thanks to the team at @PITAirport for the tour of the new sensory room & military lounge & for the sneak peek of plans for the landslide terminal with @RepBrianFitz and @ACE_Fitzgerald. #PA17 https://t.co/Du4Ir1BEOQ

Welcome to #PA17 @RepBrianFitz. First stop is a tour of @PennStateBeaver. #OnePA https://t.co/MgzOMMiSkU

A reminder that my next Town hall is coming up on Thursday 8/29 at 7p at @greentreeboro Administrative Office. This event is open to the public & to all residents of #PA17. I look forward to seeing you there. https://t.co/P94ohF94hh

Thanks to the Hookstown Fair Queen for showing me around & introducing me to some new four-legged friends. We are fortunate to have one of the nation’s best ag fairs right here in #PA17. @BeaverCtyPA https://t.co/sxRHZKHgZ8

I’ve been pushing the admin to forgive student loans for disabled vets & I’m glad POTUS is doing it now through Exec Order. But we have more to do.  My bipartisan FREED Vets Act will make student loan forgiveness for disabled vets automatic & permanent. https://t.co/UPCWYfB9Ix
Udderly fantastic visit to Brunton Dairy a 7th generation family dairy.  Looking forward to their continued success serving communities in #PA17 and beyond. https://t.co/bVeCnFCInW
Visiting the good folks at Hozak Farms to see their Christmas Trees and had to go for a ride on The Terrible Tractor!  #HereWeGo #PA17 https://t.co/8WoRwumyk1
A great visit to @SoergelOrchards in #PA17 to start my day today to see #PAfarming up close! https://t.co/RGB2TVFsck

Great time today connecting with veterans throughout #PA17. Closed out the day at the @VVAmerica Chapter 862 summer picnic in @BeaverCtyPA talking to Vietnam veterans about the Blue Water Navy Act & other issues affecting their health & well-being. https://t.co/ifrZyAJ25K

Volunteers serve our veterans every day in @VeteransHealth facilities across the nation & today I met some of the best located here in #PA17. Thanks to the staff residents & volunteers at @VAPittsburgh H.J. Heinz campus for hosting me today for afternoon activities. #B-I-N-G-O https://t.co/tUGdOIh7al

Started my day kayaking at Racoon Creek with a group of veterans & the team at Outdoor Immersion learning about the benefits of recreation & fitness activities to help the healing process of unseen injuries like PTSD. #PA17 https://t.co/J7sGXDHePb

Thanks to the @TwpofHampton Community Center for being gracious hosts & to all of you who came out to share your thoughts & opinions — & to help me wish Janice a happy 93rd! #PA17 https://t.co/AyCtZ3FDAX
Checking out the sustainability measures @MonacaBorough is taking to combat climate change including their reservoir solar array and Antoline Park’s green roof.  #PA17 https://t.co/vJwOwKDtkA

Learning about @GetRiverWise work in #PA17 including solar initiatives the Baden Academy solar roof and media lab community education and opportunities for workplace development. https://t.co/Hgk6s9aGMW

Hiking Toms Run Nature Reserve today.  Thanks to the folks at @WaterLandLife w/ https://t.co/k461NkjhPF Conservancy for their work to keep #PA17 green and protect our native wildlife. #getoutdoors https://t.co/bw6NbbF8Vr
Heard all the buzz about the Apiary at @PITairport & things are even sweeter than I’d hoped! 🐝. Right @SenatorIovino ? #PA17 https://t.co/6dc3sQEHw4

Reminder that I am holding a Town Hall tonight at 7p at @TwpofHampton Community Center. The Community Center building is located behind the pool in the Hampton Township complex at 3101 McCully Road. #PA17 https://t.co/O9qpB4ZztW

Thanks to the doctors nurses and staff @ChildrensPgh who are doing amazing work & providing cutting edge care for kids in our region every day.  #PA17 https://t.co/f88zMcstW2

It was a great day touring steel companies across #PA17. Thanks to the Ellwood Group for hosting my last stop and showing me what it takes to produce the domestic steel that our nation’s military counts on. https://t.co/qG3OkEdb5x

With @realDonaldTrump visiting @BeaverCtyPA today to learn about our energy leadership I hope he’ll respond to my letter & help resolve an IRS issue that could raise taxes on Beaver residents. #PA17 Read my letter here: https://t.co/p0l82FT1PC
I am holding another Town Hall on Thursday 8/29 at 7p at @greentreeboro Administrative Office. Click here for details & I’ll see you there: https://t.co/zMnSEEy29d

Made a stop at @SRhorses w/ @RepBrianFitz to meet the team and the horses helping our servicemembers and their families heal as they reintegrate back into civilian life. #OnePA #PA17 https://t.co/unxHkAJ63R

Earlier this year I voted for meaningful bipartisan legislation (H.R 8) to begin to address the gun crisis.  That bill is awaiting action in the Senate.  It’s past time for Senator McConnell to do his job.  #EnoughisEnough

Thanks to all of the first responders who battled the strip mall fire in Penn Hills on Sunday.  Spoke to Penn Hills No.7 VFC Chief today glad to hear the injured firefighters are all on the mend. #PA17
Joined my colleagues at the Vietnam War Memorial to honor those who paid the ultimate sacrifice in service to our country. #PA17 https://t.co/EVHmAi8FDx

Today we celebrate the 29th anniversary of the landmark bipartisan civil rights legislation Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA). We’ve come a long way but have a lot more work ahead to ensure a more inclusive and accessible country. #PA17

If you have an issue with a federal agency such as @IRSNews or @SocialSecurity my staff can assist. A member of my team will be at @northlandlib (300 Cumberland Road Pittsburgh 15237) tomorrow for mobile office hours from 10a-3p for more information. https://t.co/nO14dvrtxi
No one likes robocalls. That’s why I voted for the “Stopping Bad Robocalls Act”.   Tell the Senate to stop phoning it in and pass this bill!  #PA17 https://t.co/JTSAhhLgUv

Glad to hear that the @PAAttorneyGen officer shot yesterday in Ross Twp is in stable condition & wish him a full & speedy recovery. Still gathering details but want to thank all the law enforcement officers who go to work everyday ready to risk their lives to protect us.
